name: David McAllester
content: David McAllester's Personal WWW Page David McAllester Lenore Blum Professor, Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago mcallester@ttic.edu (773)702-5562 Bio My blog TTIC31230, Fundamentals of Deep Learning A Timeline of Research Areas: 1978-1980 Truth Maintenence 1981-1983 The Foundations of Mathematics 1984-1993 Computer Chess 1984-1995 The Ontic Proof Verification System 1988-1997 SAT Solving 1989-1991 AI Planning 1989-1992 Natural Logic, Cognitive Judgments, and Obviousness 1989-2004 Static Analysis (Compilers), Type Theory and Automated Dynamic Programming 1994-1997 Constraint Programming 1996-1999 Reinforcement Learning 1997-2008 Probabilistic Programming 1997-2013 PAC-Bayesian Learning Theory 1997-2013 Misc. Learning Theory 1999-2018 Natural Language Processing 2002-2002 Concentration Inequalities 2002-2018 Co-Training 2007-2021 Computer Vision 2009-present Type Theory and MathZero
